DataElement.preferredName: Dexamethasone Symptom Questionnaire-Chronic Most Bothersome Symptom Attributed to Steroids Descriptive Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's description of the most bothersome symptom they have experienced due to their treatment with steriods.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dexamethasone Symptom Questionnaire-Chronic Most Bothersome Symptom Attributed to Steroids
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire for patients with brain tumors that is designed to determine the incidence, severity, and change of side effects between cycles of chemotherapy._A question about an individual's most bothersome symptom attributed to steroid use.
